import React from 'react' import styles from '../../styles/Products.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Products({ title, style = {}, products = [], amount }) { const list = products.filter((_, i) => i < amount) return (
{title &&

{title}

}
{list.map(({ id, images, title, category: { name: cat }, price }) => (

{title}

{cat}
{price}$
{Math.floor(price * 0.8)}$
{Math.floor(Math.random() * 20 + 1)} purchased
))}
); } export default Products
